postScript:
:SET &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_PRIMARY# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.mngm_srv_pri")
:SET &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_SECONDARY# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.mngm_srv_sec")
:SET &DB_DIRECTORY_NAME# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.db_directory_name")
:SET &DB_BACKUP_PATH# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.db_backup_path")
:SET &DB_RUN_MODE# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.run_mode")

:PUBLISH &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_PRIMARY#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_SECONDARY#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DB_DIRECTORY_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DB_BACKUP_PATH#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DB_RUN_MODE#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &AFSM_CHECK# = 0

! WMS DB
:SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#, '*"module_name":"WMS"*')
:IF &RET# = "Y"
:  SET &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].dbDetails.url")
:  SET &WMS_DB_PORT# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].dbDetails.db_port")
:  SET &WMS_DB_SID# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].dbDetails.db_sid")
:  SET &WMS_DB_USERNAME# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].dbDetails.db_username")
:  SET &WMS_DB_PASSWORD# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].dbDetails.db_password")
:  SET &WMS_DB_SCHEMA# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].dbDetails.db_schema")
:  SET &AFSM_CHECK# = &AFSM_CHECK# + 1
:ELSE
:  SET &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW

! REFS DB
:SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#, '*"module_name":"REFS"*')
:IF &RET# = "Y"
:  SET &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].dbDetails.url")
:  SET &REFS_DB_PORT# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].dbDetails.db_port")
:  SET &REFS_DB_SID# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].dbDetails.db_sid")
:  SET &REFS_DB_USERNAME# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].dbDetails.db_username")
:  SET &REFS_DB_PASSWORD# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].dbDetails.db_password")
:  SET &REFS_DB_SCHEMA# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].dbDetails.db_schema")
:  SET &AFSM_CHECK# = &AFSM_CHECK# + 1
:ELSE
:  SET &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW

! EMS DB
:SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#, '*"module_name":"EMS"*')
:IF &RET# = "Y"
:  SET &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'EMS')].dbDetails.url")
:  SET &EMS_DB_PORT# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'EMS')].dbDetails.db_port")
:  SET &EMS_DB_SID# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'EMS')].dbDetails.db_sid")
:  SET &EMS_DB_USERNAME# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'EMS')].dbDetails.db_username")
:  SET &EMS_DB_PASSWORD# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'EMS')].dbDetails.db_password")
:  SET &EMS_DB_SCHEMA# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'EMS')].dbDetails.db_schema")
:  SET &AFSM_CHECK# = &AFSM_CHECK# + 1
:ELSE
:  SET &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &AFSM_CHECK#,,TASK
